languages.text: "Если там собираются мятежники — может, обстрелять монастырь? Или высадить десант?"
"Why not shell the monastery if that is where the insurgents have gathered? Or deploy a landing force?"
languages.original_text: "Если там собираются мятежники — может, обстрелять монастырь? Или высадить десант?"

traits.locale_text: "Shell the monastery, maybe, if insurgents have gathered there? Or deploy a landing force?"
"Shell the monastery, maybe, if insurgents have gathered there? Or deploy a landing force?"
"Why not shell the monastery if that's where the insurgents have gathered? Or deploy a landing force?"
"Why not shell the monastery if that's where the insurgents have gathered? Or deploy a landing force?"
"Why not shell the monastery if that is where the insurgents have gathered? Or deploy a landing force?"
"Why not shell the monastery if that is where the insurgents have gathered? Or deploy a landing force?"

languages.text: "Warum nicht einfach das Kloster beschießen, wenn sich die Aufständischen dort versammelt haben? Oder einen Landetrupp schicken?"
languages.original_text: "Why not shell the monastery if that is where the insurgents have gathered? Or deploy a landing force?"

traits.locale_text: "Warum nicht einfach das Kloster beschießen, wenn sich die Aufständischen dort versammelt haben? Oder einen Landetrupp schicken?"

languages.text: « Pourquoi ne bombardez-vous pas le monastère si c'est là que les insurgés se sont réunis ? Vous pourriez aussi déployer des troupes au sol. »
languages.original_text: "Why not shell the monastery if that is where the insurgents have gathered? Or deploy a landing force?"

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi ne bombardez-vous pas le monastère si c'est là que les insurgés se sont réunis ? Vous pourriez aussi déployer des troupes au sol. »

languages.text: “既然叛军聚集在修道院，那为什么不进行炮击，或者部署登陆部队？”
languages.original_text: "Why not shell the monastery if that is where the insurgents have gathered? Or deploy a landing force?"

traits.locale_text: “既然叛军聚集在修道院，那为什么不进行炮击，或者部署登陆部队？”

languages.text: 「修道院に反乱者が集っているなら、なぜ砲撃しない？もしくは上陸部隊を送ってもいいのでは？」
languages.original_text: "Why not shell the monastery if that is where the insurgents have gathered? Or deploy a landing force?"

traits.locale_text: 「修道院に反乱者が集っているなら、なぜ砲撃しない？もしくは上陸部隊を送ってもいいのでは？」

languages.text: «¿Por qué no bombardear el monasterio si es allí donde se han reunido los insurgentes? ¿O desplegar una fuerza de asalto?».
languages.original_text: "Why not shell the monastery if that is where the insurgents have gathered? Or deploy a landing force?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué no bombardear el monasterio si es allí donde se han reunido los insurgentes? ¿O desplegar una fuerza de asalto?».

languages.text: "Madem asiler orada toplanmış, neden manastırı bombalamadınız veya çıkarma kuvveti konuşlandırmadınız?"
languages.original_text: "Why not shell the monastery if that is where the insurgents have gathered? Or deploy a landing force?"

traits.locale_text: "Madem asiler orada toplanmış, neden manastırı bombalamadınız veya çıkarma kuvveti konuşlandırmadınız?"
